segments.text: Fred , is it a good time to talk with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As you know , I have accepted three new programs in our company this year , but I am not sure I can do my work well . And right now my dilemma is that I can not find a person whom I can trust for these three programs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think we can do about this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are not willing to miss the chance ; however , our staff is not big enough now . So , to be honest , I want you to help me to finish all these programs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sir , I am busy in market development . So I am worried whether I can do this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am aware you have been working so hard . Before hiring more employees , you are still needed to do this .
segments.speaker: S1
